articles.title: British Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
British Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
						
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Michael John Gifford, new British ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.
